                             java.lang.Integer timeout,
                             java.lang.String scriptBody)

        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        serverId - System ID
        chainLabel - Label of the action chain.
        uid - User ID on the remote system.
        scriptBody - Base64 encoded script.
        gid - Group ID on the remote system.
        timeout - Timeout
        Returns:
        True or false in XML-RPC representation (1 or 0 respectively)
